title: Safŏrgatgrénfwa
author: Mahanma I, Iliç I, Safŏr I

outline.title: Ordinary World
outline.text: The protagonist is introduced in their normal everyday life.

outline.title: Call to adventure
outline.text: Something happens to shake up the hero’s everyday life.

outline.title: Refusal of the Call
outline.text: The hero often has doubts, just wants to stay in their safe existence.

outline.title: Meeting the Mentor
outline.text: They meet someone who gives them advice that will be useful for the coming challenges.

outline.title: Crossing the Threshold
outline.text: They change location or burn bridges in a metaphorical sense, meaning they cannot simply return to their old life as if nothing has happened.

outline.title: Tests, allies, enemies
outline.text: They face various challenges, and make new friends.

outline.title: Approach the innermost cave
outline.text: The hero prepares to battle terrible danger or inner conflict.

outline.title: The ordeal
outline.text: The hero must face great demons, which could be internal or external, or both.

outline.title: Reward
outline.text: The hero receives some kind of reward for facing their demons.

outline.title: Road Back
outline.text: The hero begins their journey back to everyday life.

outline.title: Resurrection
outline.text: The greatest battle and most dangerous encounter.
